document.full_text: manufacturing in new york state grew at its slowest pace in five months in may, while u.s. homebuilders remained deeply pessimistic as buyers stayed away from the market, data released on monday showed.
document.title: ny manufacturing growth slowest in 5 months in may
lines_and_colors: manufacturing in new york state grew at its slowest pace in five months in may, while u.s. homebuilders remained deeply pessimistic as buyers stayed away from the market, data released on monday showed.
